title: What is the historical basis to the use of underwear, and why do we still wear it? - Quora

response.answer_text: I imagine the wearing of underwear is for modest and hygienic purposes.  For men, underwear can provide support and comfort, depending on the kind. For women, it is a matter of both hygiene and comfort; underwear plays an important part of collecting vaginal discharge and during menstruation, menstrual blood.
I just want to know why wouldn't anyone wear underwear? There's just a comforting feeling about wearing them.
